sources.name: SequentialFile0
sources.script:
source(output(
		bnk_id as integer,
		bnk_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as integer,
		state_code as string,
		contact_no as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SequentialFile0

sources.name: SequentialFile1
sources.script:
source(output(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SequentialFile1

sinks.name: SequentialFile11
sinks.script:
Aggregator9 sink(input(
		DKB as string,
		{1} as string,
		{035} as string,
		{CANTON -MA} as string,
		USD as string,
		{DKB Address} as string,
		{DKB City} as string,
		{DKB State  Testing  part flow change UAT US   State character length in office file via admin portal} as string,
		{DKB Zipcode Testing} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SequentialFile11

transformations.name: Lookup6
transformations.script:
Filter4, SequentialFile1 lookup(SequentialFile0@state_code == SequentialFile1@state_code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup6

transformations.name: Aggregator9
transformations.script:
Lookup6 aggregate(groupBy(bnk_name,
		state_name),
	city = count(city)) ~> Aggregator9
